response.original_title: 実録!!ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像 2
response.overview: Contains all 10 episodes of shivering horror footage!! Is it the spirit of a worker who was tragically cut off in the past due to a work accident? When I watched the video later, I noticed that there was one more person, but it seems that no one noticed that on the day of the event. [Attacks my dog] I took a picture of a dog that recently joined the family. Something approaching the frolicking dog... [Restaurant on the Cliff] A seafood restaurant that I stopped by on my way home from surfing. What was witnessed there... [Visitor] I was supposed to be watching the scenery, but I was the one being watched...
response.tagline: 100% pure horror footage that really happened!!
response.title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video 2
